task.name: Locate and recover Glady’s ID badge from the security desk.
task.desc: Infiltrate the admin floor and secure Glady’s lost ID badge without alerting guards.

subtasks.name: Find the security desk location
subtasks.desc: Locate the main security hub in the admin section.

subtasks.name: Avoid or neutralize patrolling guards
subtasks.desc: Sneak past or disable enemy guards to reach the desk.

subtasks.name: Search desk drawers
subtasks.desc: Thoroughly search the drawers for Glady’s badge.

subtasks.name: Verify badge authenticity
subtasks.desc: Use scanner to confirm badge is genuine.

subtasks.name: Mark badge location
subtasks.desc: Log the badge’s position on your map.

subtasks.name: Report retrieval
subtasks.desc: Confirm retrieval to Agency via radio.

task.name: Download HR server logs from a terminal in the admin office.
task.desc: Extract HR server logs without leaving a trace.

subtasks.name: Bypass login
subtasks.desc: Use hacking tools to break through credentials.

subtasks.name: Download logs
subtasks.desc: Copy HR server logs to portable drive.

task.name: Destroy all visitor logs manually (burn paper files).
task.desc: Eliminate visitor logs to erase trace of allies.

subtasks.name: Find storage room
subtasks.desc: Locate where physical logs are stored.

subtasks.name: Pick or force entry
subtasks.desc: Break into the logs room quietly.

task.name: Override surveillance system to create blind spots.
task.desc: Disable cameras temporarily to cover your infiltration routes.

subtasks.name: Identify blind spot zones
subtasks.desc: Pick areas to cut off cameras.

subtasks.name: Bypass door lock
subtasks.desc: Hack into the secure room entrance.

subtasks.name: Confirm blind spots
subtasks.desc: Ensure your planned path is clear.

task.name: Plant backdoor in the security system servers.
task.desc: Install persistent access into surveillance databases.

subtasks.name: Access security console
subtasks.desc: Gain control of the main terminal.

task.name: Seize physical access cards for high-security zones.
task.desc: Collect and confiscate all master access cards to control movement.

task.name: Steal prototype schematics from lab archives.
task.desc: Extract experimental designs without triggering biohazard lockdown.

task.name: Plant false research data in laboratory systems.
task.desc: Replace real results with corrupted versions to mislead rivals.

task.name: Confiscate restricted chemical samples.
task.desc: Secure dangerous compounds before they leak to black markets.

subtasks.name: Locate sample vault
subtasks.desc: Identify storage lockers with hazardous vials.

task.name: Steal advanced weapon blueprints.
task.desc: Infiltrate armory to copy latest weapons schematics.

task.name: Sabotage ammunition stockpiles.
task.desc: Corrupt storage so rival weapons malfunction in battle.

task.name: Secure prototype weapons for military use.
task.desc: Take control of experimental hardware before rogue actors claim them.

task.name: Collect confidential meeting transcripts.
task.desc: Retrieve recordings of executive calls for intel.

task.name: Blackmail executive leadership.
task.desc: Gather compromising evidence to control upper management.

task.name: Arrest high-ranking traitors.
task.desc: Apprehend executives suspected of espionage.

task.name: Intercept classified communications.
task.desc: Tap into secure lines and extract sensitive transmissions.

task.name: Insert spyware into main servers.
task.desc: Deploy long-term surveillance malware across data systems.

task.name: Shut down illegal data operations.
task.desc: Disable and seize rogue server operations.

subtasks.name: Secure evidence
subtasks.desc: Catalog seized data for legal use.

task.name: Assassinate key double agent.
task.desc: Neutralize a traitor hiding in the penthouse without civilian casualties.

task.name: Bribe influential politician guest.
task.desc: Secure a politician’s loyalty through covert payments.

task.name: Protect visiting dignitary.
task.desc: Ensure safety of foreign ally during penthouse stay.

task.name: Secure helicopter extraction.
task.desc: Hold rooftop until Agency extraction team arrives.

subtasks.name: Reach rooftop
subtasks.desc: Fight or sneak past final guards.

task.name: Hijack enemy extraction chopper.
task.desc: Intercept and capture helicopter for Corporation use.

task.name: Seize rooftop for military lockdown.
task.desc: Control extraction point and deny use to enemies.
